author: Gina
content:
i love graffitti when i find it /capture it but i must admit i would not like it on my own property ... tis a fine line ...   i hope you feel better soooooon ... at least with the onset of spring that might help a feeling of well being ? ... 

i really really will one day explore the music links you provide ... i am in awe of the consistency with which you provide a song  that relates, with every post ...

regards >>> Gina
http://fyneimages.blogspot.com/ 
http://ginaseye.blogspot.com/
